s.text: The hamster has not been used extensively in genomics research; however, it has been used extensively in various areas of investigation including circadian rhythm research [ 10 ] and also in investigations in a number of areas of research in reproductive biology.

PCR reactions were performed using human testis Marathon RACE-Ready cDNA (Clontech, Palo Alto, CA) using conditions described previously [ 43 ] . PCR products were subcloned in to the pGEM-Teasy plasmid and sequenced.
